vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'G3121', 'matchingForm': 'Μαλελεήλ', 'stepTransliteration': 'maleleēl', 'gloss': 'Mahalaleel', '_searchResultRange': 'Luke.3.37@Gen.5.12-Luke.3.37', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '瑪勒列', '_es_Gloss': 'Mahalaleel', '_zh_Gloss': '玛勒列'}, {'strongNumber': 'H4111H', 'matchingForm': 'מַהֲלַלְאֵל', 'stepTransliteration': 'ma.ha.lal.el', 'gloss': 'Mahalalel', '_searchResultRange': 'Neh.11.4', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '瑪勒列', '_es_Gloss': 'Mahalaleel', '_zh_Gloss': '玛勒列'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.5.12;
son of: Kenan (H7018);
father of: Jared (H3382); also called Mahalaleel (NIV: Mahalel) at Luk.3.37;
Also named: Maleleēl<\i> (Μαλελεήλ "Mahalaleel" G3121)
§ Mahalaleel = "praise of God"
1) son of Cainan and the 4th in descent from Adam in the line of Seth
2) a descendant of Perez, the son of Judah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Cainán; descendiente de Set; (b)   padre de Sefatías; tribu de Judá; en tiempos de Nehemías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪勒列 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "上帝的讚頌"
1) 該南的兒子, 亞當兒子塞特的第四代子孫
2) 猶大的兒子法勒斯的後代 (尼 11:4)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
玛勒列 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "上帝的赞颂"
1) 该南的儿子, 亚当儿子塞特的第四代子孙
2) 犹大的儿子法勒斯的后代 (尼 11:4)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.11.4;
father of: Shephatiah (H8203N)
§ Mahalaleel = "praise of God"
1) son of Cainan and the 4th in descent from Adam in the line of Seth
2) a descendant of Perez, the son of Judah
